籤詩版本二:
Lokacin da iska ta haskaka kyandirori da inuwa maras kyau a sararin sama, sai su zama kamar furanni a cikin madubi a cikin hayyaci.
Na gaji, yara suka roke ni su kula da ni, ta yaya zan san kawai ruɗi ne?
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana kama da iska mai kunna kyandir.
Sunan karya yana cutar da komai.
解曰: Dukiya tana cikin sama. Talauci makoma ce. Babu bukatar neman shawara. Duk an kaddara.
籤詩故事一:
◇Tafiyar Kong Ming ta Shida daga Qishan
A lokacin daular Uku, tsaunin Qishan ya ratsa Wei da Shu. Kong Ming akai-akai ya fita zuwa tsaunin Qishan don kaiwa Wei hari amma ya kasa.
A karo na shida da ya fita zuwa Qishan, Kong Ming ya rubuta umarninsa, amma ya kasa yin nasara a karshe. A karshe, Zhuge Liang ya rasu ne sakamakon rashin lafiya a birnin Wuzhangyuan yana da shekaru 54 a duniya sakamakon wuce gona da iri.
(Wannan labari shine misalan "hikima ba ta kai karma")
聖意: Ku yi wa gidanku addu'a, ku yi hankali, ku nemi dukiya da riba, ku yi hattara a cikin kasuwanci, ku kula da aurenku, ku kiyaye aurenku, ku zauna lafiya, ku zauna lafiya, ku zauna lafiya, ku samu mutane, ku rasa tsutsotsi, ku lalace, ku rasa dabbobi. , bace, bace, shari’ar jama’a, asara kuɗi, a yi hijira, zama mai ra’ayin mazan jiya, a rasa dukiya, rashin lafiya, rashin lafiya, yi babban canji a Yinshan,
古人: Tafiya ta shida ta Kongming daga Qishan
